channel.title: NO hama servers in advertisement
channel.description:
[s][u]Earlier my friend told me on advertisement that their is no hama! [/u] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,119005.0.html their is proof
Why no hama half of servers is hamma because no-ip doesnt work for them. Whats the big deal with hama servers it shouldnt make a difference please some one tell me why[/s]
Nvm he changed it (not loathy :mad:) but the good old moparisthebest his name says it all!

item.title: NO hama servers in advertisement
item.dc:creator: @rukan85 rukan85
item.description:
@rukan85 wrote:

ok we can stop spamming about it now ham is allowed again…

Read full topic

item.title: NO hama servers in advertisement
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“flamedarth, post:10, topic:81102”]Omg moparisthebest pwns all!!! God i hated that rule heck about what i said!!!

This is the wrong section.
This “Question” has been turned into a discussion.
Moderators, please lock.

HAMACHI servers are better than no-ip servers. “flamedarth” you have no knowledge in computers at all. A good computer does not mean it can log onto no-ip servers. I have a computer with a 110GB hardrive, pentium IV, 1GB ram, Xtra Broadband, and I still cannot get into no-ip servers.
I do not understand your term of “handling” no-ip. When you log onto a no-ip server, its just the same as logging onto a Hamachi server. There is no difference, there aren’t 2 types of Runescape.

Gunztheduel

Wow thanks for the heads up not wana be mod much??[/quote]

I’m not saying this because I want to become a moderator. I certainly do not want to become a moderator. I’m saying this over your lack of knowledge to computers. The main reason is that I do not want you to advertise negative factors about Hamachi. This affects all the Hamachi servers, as less people will join their server. I do not want you to influence people not to use Hamachi either.

Gunztheduel

Read full topic
